SEARCH
Package units

Class Droid

java.lang.Object
units.Droid
Direct Known Subclasses:
Assasin, Summoner, Tank
public class Droid extends Object
The Droid class represents a combat droid with various attributes like health, attack damage, evasion rate, and armor. It also includes methods for attacking enemies and using special abilities.

  • Constructor Details

    • Droid

      public Droid()
      Default constructor that initializes a droid with default values.

    • Droid

      public Droid(String name, int healthPoints, int atackDamage, String droidType, int evationRate, int armorValue)
      Parametrized constructor that initializes a droid with specified values.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the droid
      healthPoints - the health points of the droid
      atackDamage - the attack damage of the droid
      droidType - the type of the droid
      evationRate - the evasion rate of the droid
      armorValue - the armor value of the droid

    • calculateDamageAffectedByArmor

      protected static int calculateDamageAffectedByArmor(int damageGiven, int enemyDroidArmorValue)
      Calculates the damage affected by the enemy droid's armor value.
      Parameters:
      damageGiven - the initial damage
      enemyDroidArmorValue - the armor value of the enemy droid
      Returns:
      the final damage after armor reduction

    • atackEnemy

      public int atackEnemy(Droid enemyDroid, boolean outputLogs)
      Attacks an enemy droid and calculates the damage based on the attack damage, critical hit, and armor.
      Parameters:
      enemyDroid - the enemy droid to attack
      outputLogs - whether to output log messages about the attack
      Returns:
      the amount of damage dealt to the enemy droid
